bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
Uid = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "uid"));
Uid1 = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "uid1"));
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!cookie.getCookie(baseUrl).includes('my=')) {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Uid"), Uid);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("dmzj-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的订阅', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv3api')}}/UCenter/subscribeWithLevel?uid=${Uid}&sub_type=0&page={{page-1}}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('浏览历史', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nninterface')}}/api/getReInfoWithLevel/comic/${Uid}/{{page-1}}?uid=${Uid}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
T = `{{Get('t')}}`;
U = `{{Get('u')}}`;
U1 = `{{Get('u') < 3 ? Get('u') : '2'}}`;
url1 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'm')}}/rank/0-${T}-${U}-{{page-1}}.json?uid=${Uid1}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('人气', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'm')}}/rank/1-0-${U1}-{{page-1}}.json?uid=${Uid1}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('吐槽', url2, 1, 0.25, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'm')}}/rank/2-0-3-{{page-1}}.json?uid=${Uid1}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('订阅', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv3api') + '/classify/filter.json?uid=${Uid1}';
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url))[0].items;
R = `{{Get('r')}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    Filter = `{{String(get('theme','`;
    Filter1 = `') + '-' + get('cate',Get('o')) + '-' + get('status',Get('p')) + '-' + get('zone',Get('q'))).replace(/0-|\-0/g, '')}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv3api')}}/classifyWithLevel/${Filter}${i}${Filter1}/${R}/{{page-1}}.json?uid=${Uid1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].tag_name, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Android,DMZJ1,5.1.1",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.name: name

ruleContent.content:
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：'); Uid = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "uid")); Uid1 = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "uid1")); comicid = cache.get(java.md5Encode16("ID" + book.bookUrl)); comicpy = String(book.bookUrl).replace(/.*\_py\=/, ''); chapterid = baseUrl.replace(/.*\=(\d+)$/, '$1'); if(String(Account).length > 0 && cookie.getCookie(baseUrl).includes('my=')) { var timestamp = new Date().getTime(); var secondsTimestamp = parseInt(timestamp / 1000); var time = secondsTimestamp.toString(); var json = `[{"${comicid}":"${chapterid}","comicId":"${comicid}","chapterId":"${chapterid}","page":1,"time":"${time}"}]`; let url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nninterface') + '/api/record/getRe?st=comic&json=' + java.encodeURI(json) + '&uid=' + Uid + '&type=3'; java.ajax(url); } if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { var Date = String(java.timeFormat(new Date().getTime())).replace(/\d+\/(.*)\s.*/, '$1'); if (String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 4 && !Date.includes(cache.get("dmzj-sign"))) { var signdate = sign(); cache.put("dmzj-sign", signdate); } var list = JSON.parse(result).data.chapterInfo; if (!list) { url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'm') + '/view/' + comicid + '/' + chapterid + '.html'; html = java.ajax(url); if (html.includes('initData')) { list = JSON.parse(html.match(/initData\((\{.*\})\,/)[1]); imglist = list.page_url_hd || list.page_url; } else { url = Get('url') + '/api/v1/comic2/chapter/detail?uid=' + Uid1 + '&comic_py=' + comicpy + '&chapter_id=' + chapterid; result = java.ajax(url); var list = JSON.parse(result).data.chapterInfo; imglist = list.page_url_hd || list.page_url; } } else { imglist = list.page_url_hd || list.page_url; } var result=''; for(i in imglist){ result +='\n' } } else { '
'; }

ruleExplore.author: author

<js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    var Date = String(java.timeFormat(new Date().getTime())).replace(/\d+\/(.*)\s.*/, '$1');
    if (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0 && !Date.includes(cache.get("dmzj-sign"))) {
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("dmzj-sign", signdate);
    }
    Uid = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "uid"));
    Uid1 = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "uid1"));
    if (baseUrl.includes('/subscribeWithLevel')) {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result);
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '';
            var k = list[i].status.replace(/[中已]/g, '');
            var latest = list[i].sub_update + (list[i].sub_uptime > 0 ? ('〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].sub_uptime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕') : '');
            var url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv4api') + '/v2/comic/detail/' + list[i].id + '?uid=' + Uid1;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].name,
                'author': cache.get(java.md5Encode16(url + "Author")),
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].sub_img,
                'url': url
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next)[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else if (baseUrl.includes('/getReInfoWithLevel/')) {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result);
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '';
            var k = '';
            var intro = '\nㅤ\n⏰时间：' + java.timeFormat(list[i].viewing_time) + '\n📖观看至：' + list[i].chapter_name;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].comic_name,
                'author': cache.get(java.md5Encode16(url + "Author")),
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': intro,
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv4api') + '/v2/comic/detail/' + list[i].comic_id + '?uid=' + Uid1
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+)\?uid\=$/, function(match, p1) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + '?uid=';}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list[0] || list[0].comic_id == JSON.parse(next)[0].comic_id) {
            Data();
        }
    } else if (baseUrl.includes('/rank/')) {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result);
        var D = ['日','周','月','总'];
        var K = ['人气:','吐槽:','订阅:'];
        var index = parseInt(baseUrl.replace(/.*(\d)\-\d\.json/, '$1'));
        var index1 = parseInt(baseUrl.replace(/.*rank\/(\d).*/, '$1'));
        for (i in list) {
            var s = D[index] + K[index1] + Num(list[i].num || list[i].vote_num || list[i].sub_num);
            var k = (list[i].status || '').replace(/[中已]/g, '') + ',' + (list[i].zone || list[i].readergroup || '') + ',' + list[i].types.replace(/\//g, ',');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name || list[i].chapter_name;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].name,
                'author': list[i].authors,
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest + '〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].last_updatetime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕',
                'intro': list[i].description,
                'cover': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'images') + '/' + list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv4api') + '/v2/comic/detail/' + list[i].id + '?uid=' + Uid1
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+).json$/, function(match, p1) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + '.json';}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next)[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result);
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '✦ ' + Num(list[i].num);
            var k = list[i].status.replace(/[中已]/g, '') + ',' + list[i].types.replace(/\//g, ',');
            var latest = list[i].last_updatetime > 0 ? ('〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].last_updatetime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕') : '';
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': list[i].authors,
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv4api') + '/v2/comic/detail/' + list[i].id + '?uid=' + Uid1
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+).json$/, function(match, p1) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + '.json';}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next)[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

    if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.comic_list[0] || /书源|使用|说明|書源|說明/.test(searchkey)) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    Uid = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "uid"));
    Uid1 = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "uid1"));
    var index = book.getVariable("custom") > 0 ? book.getVariable("custom") : '0';
    var list0 = JSON.parse(result).data.comicInfo;
    if (list0.chapterList) {
        var list = list0.chapterList[index].data;
        date = String(java.timeFormat(list[0].updatetime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-');
        reg = book.name + '：';
        for (i = list.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
            title = list[i].chapter_title;
            title = title.replace(reg, '');
            order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
            title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
            data.push({

                'link': Get('url') + '/api/v1/comic1/chapter/detail?uid=2665531&comic_id=' + list0.id + '&chapter_id=' + list[i].chapter_id,
                'time': String(java.timeFormat(list[i].updatetime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-')
            });
        }

        url1 = baseUrl.replace(/www/, 'm').replace(/api.*\_py\=/, 'info/') + '.html';
        html = java.ajax(url1);
        java.setContent(html);

        date = String(java.getElements('.date').text());
        reg = book.name + '：';
        for (i = list.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
            title = list[i].chapter_name;
            title = title.replace(reg, '');
            order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
            title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
            data.push({
                'title': i == 0 ? title + '〔' + date + '〕' : title,
                'link': Get('url') + '/api/v1/comic2/chapter/detail?uid=' + Uid1 + '&comic_py=' + baseUrl.replace(/.*info\/(.*)\.html/, '$1') + '&chapter_id=' + list[i].id,
                'time': ''
            });
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/api/v1/comic1/search?keyword=' + e + '&page={{page}}&size=20';
}(key));
</js>
